title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Oct 18 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Oct 18 2021
description:
Covid-19 restrictions prompt backlash on college campuses. Airline mask rules have no basis in science. Delta CEO refuses to enforce Biden's vaccine mandate. C&B: Psaki providing lame excuse for Biden's maskless restaurant visit. Callers share their experiences with mandate zealots, including flashing their 6-foot-long measuring tapes at them. Clay and Buck again give condolences to Colin Powell's family and wish him to Rest in Peace. The questions on covid breakthrough cases aren't why vaccinated 84-year-olds battling cancer might get a breakthrough case. C&B bring up real covid breakthrough issues. Why are beards so popular? 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
